topics.body:
"So apparently Disney Bans PG-13 Smoking, Including Any Marvel Films It Produces":http://www.inquisitr.com/1922257/disney-bans-pg-13-smoking-including-any-marvel-films-it-produces/

That's right folks. That means you aint going to be seeing Nick Fury pop a cigarette in any future Marvel Film. :/

Someone in the Comments put it nicely. 

"You can punch, kick, shoot, kill, irradiate, destroy, seduce, swear, and steal; but don't smoke it gives kids the wrong idea. Priorities?"

Like don't get me wrong, I hate smoking. Will never do it. And would try to convince others to get off of it. Its bad for your health.

But dude you just cant PRETEND LIKE PEOPLE DONT SMOKE.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5506c16b6368727a1fb70900#post_5506c16b6368727a1fb70900
Its true. Its like.

"no more smoking in your movies. This should help! Right? ~Right?~" 

Wrong. Little Jimmy just saw his friends smoking so now he's smoking.

Little Jimmy just saw his Mom and dad smoking so now he's smoking.

Hell, Little Jimmy just saw a RANDOM PERSON WALKING DOWN THE STREET smoking and so now he's smoking. 

Getting rid of Smoking in your movies doesn't do anything but give the people that write them less things to work with at that point.
